description: Parker Wright comes to us from Phoenix, AZ and he loves showing off for the camera.  At 37 years of age, Parker is a confident man with a very nice physique, a nice amount of body hair and a penchant for toys.  Our friends at Perfect Fit toys sent me their combination cock ring/ball stretcher and when Parker saw it sitting on my desk, he asked if he could try it out.  Of course I said yes and he also told me he has a thing for locker rooms and jock straps.  Without hesitation we whisked Parker over to our gym locker room and let the cameras roll as he put on quite a show with his new toy.  He was rock hard and his balls stretching against the material of the ball stretcher are a nice site.  Especially when he was bent over showing off his beautiful ass!  Enjoy this intimate moment with a true High Performance Man!
title: The Ball Stretcher
